channel.title: [508] Editing the server + Compiling?
channel.description:
Hey guys. I'm new to 508's, I admit. I found out how to run it ( lol wow ^_^) but how do I edit the server? What do I click?? Like in 317's there's a client.java and you just edit this. But apparently 508's are more complicated. So I need help on what thing to click so I can edit the server. Thanks a bunch :)
Also....how do I compile? What do I click? XD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 04:42:06 pm[/size][hr]Bump... By the way I'm using Sex Sex-scape V2.1 as base
